hiveArticle.title: Stackshare & DailyNow - 2 Awesome Application for Developers
hiveArticle.body:
### [DailyNow](https://www.dailynow.co/)

When I have to read some dev articles I have to shift between different websites like Dev.to, Medium, InfoQ, DZOne etc..., I wanted an hacker news like site which will curate the list of dev posts for me. Luckily I found DailyNow which curates the list for me base on my interest and also without going to any website. 

DailyNow has a Chrome Extension which gives me the articles on clicking on a new tab.

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUSbF1bECouJyyoE8JXHkT56cNsQXYs3m4C3gV7NqTfEj/image.png)
PC : https://www.dailynow.co/

### [StackShare](https://stackshare.io/) 

As a Full Stack Developer, you always have to look for a best tools which can help you to achieve success. Now when you are working in a small company you might not get good guide which tool to use and which now, then why not look for the Tech Stack of some of the Big Companies or even Startup. This is where StackShare is useful which gives you the Tech Stack information which companies uses.

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmfSX5cK2J7AuFRrV7fbKm68U1EGLKwQVFiiyz2PCkUWMs/image.png)
PC : https://stackshare.io/
